channel.title: CVE Feed for Thomas Kuhlmann -- Link To Bible
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Thomas Kuhlmann -- Link To Bible

item.title: CVE-2024-37538|2024-07-23T14:04:30.996Z -- thomas%20kuhlmann -- link%20to%20bible
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Thomas Kuhlmann Link To Bible allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Link To Bible: from n/a through 2.5.9.
